# Ritesh Bucha

> What I'm learning about shipping great products, becoming a better developer, and growing a career in tech.


- [About](https://bucharitesh.in/me/about.md): A quick intro to me, my tech stack, and how to connect.
- [Experience](https://bucharitesh.in/me/experience.md): Highlights from my career and key roles I've taken on.
- [Craft](https://bucharitesh.in/me/craft.md): A collection of my work.
- [Bookmarks](https://bucharitesh.in/me/bookmarks.md): Bookmarks from my collections.

## Craft

- [Metallic Button](https://bucharitesh.in/craft/metallic-button)
- [Modern Progress](https://bucharitesh.in/craft/modern-progress)
- [Game of Life](https://bucharitesh.in/craft/game-of-life)
- [Magical Mouse](https://bucharitesh.in/craft/magical-mouse)
- [Book](https://bucharitesh.in/craft/book)
- [Icon Maker](https://icon-maker.bucharitesh.in)
- [View Magnifier](https://bucharitesh.in/craft/view-magnifier)
- [Split Text Effect](https://bucharitesh.in/craft/split-text-effect)
- [Pixel Icon](https://bucharitesh.in/craft/pixel-icon)

This file provides LLM-friendly entry points to Crafts

## Components

- [Book](https://bucharitesh.in/craft/book): A book component for Next.js apps with next-themes and Tailwind CSS, supporting system, light, and dark modes.
- [Game of Life](https://bucharitesh.in/craft/game-of-life): A game of life component for Next.js apps with next-themes and Tailwind CSS, supporting system, light, and dark modes.
- [Magical Mouse](https://bucharitesh.in/craft/magical-mouse): A magical mouse component for Next.js apps with next-themes and Tailwind CSS, supporting system, light, and dark modes.
- [Metallic Button](https://bucharitesh.in/craft/metallic-button): A liquid metal button with WebGL shader background and prismatic outline ring.
- [Modern Progress](https://bucharitesh.in/craft/modern-progress): A modern progress component for Next.js apps with next-themes and Tailwind CSS, supporting system, light, and dark modes.
- [Pixel Icon](https://bucharitesh.in/craft/pixel-icon): A pixel icon component for Next.js apps with next-themes and Tailwind CSS, supporting system, light, and dark modes.
- [Split Text Effect](https://bucharitesh.in/craft/split-text-effect): A split text effect component for Next.js apps with next-themes and Tailwind CSS, supporting system, light, and dark modes.
- [View Magnifier](https://bucharitesh.in/craft/view-magnifier): A view magnifier component for Next.js apps with next-themes and Tailwind CSS, supporting system, light, and dark modes.
